Detailed Description

cvmx_uctl::_host_cfg

This register allows configuration of various host controller (UAHC) features. Most of these are strap signals and should be modified only while the controller is not running.

This register is accessible only when UCTL()_CTL[H_CLK_EN] = 1.

This register can be reset by IOI reset or with UCTL()_CTL[UCTL_RST].
